DOC.brief_summary: This open label , randomize , Parallel Assignment , placebo-controlled study . One purpose study investigate multiple dose Ginkgolides Meglumine Injection alter pharmacokinetics Midazolam , calculate pharmacokinetic parameter Single multiple dose Ginkgolides Meglumine Injection .
DOC.brief_title: A Drug-Drug Interaction Study To Investigate The Ginkgolides Meglumine Injection To Alter The Pharmacokinetics Of Midazolam
DOC.criteria: Ages 1840 . Male . Subjects standard weight ( generally less 50 kg ) , body mass index ( BMI ) within 1925 . All physical examination ( include ECG , kidney function , liver function , blood routine , urine routine , etc ) normal . Subjects history significant disease , allergy orthostatic hypotension . All subject sign inform consent inform possible adverse drug reaction .are able complete examination define . Subjects communicate medical staff , subject cerebral insufficiency psychological problem . Partner subject plan pregnant . Subject primary disease vital organ . Subjects history drug dependence psychosis last 2 year . Subjects severe blood loss blood donation 200 mL prior 3 month . Subjects participate another clinical trial within prior 3 month . Known suspected history alcohol drug abuse . Subjects abnormal clinical significance check preclinical laboratory data physical examination . Known allergy pharmaceutical ingredient Ginkgolides Meglumine Injection allergy sufferer allergic two kind food drug past . Subjects use drug prior 2 week . Subjects unexplained infection . The subject could complete study opinion Principal Investigator due reason . Subjects test positive screen human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HbsAg ) , etc .
